item.title: Host your website with AWS Amplify
item.description:
Introduction

Hello World! This is the first project document on my blog and the project is blog itself. This would be a short project relatively because implementation of the project is mostly simple and requirements are clear. I can’t include website creation processes or Hugo related parts because in best case I’m amateur on that field. I only want to share what was my requirements, why I choose to proceed with AWS Amplify and what could be the other solutions and what kind of struggles I face on the process.
